settings.heading: Kalles is an online shop for handicrafts .

settings.text: Crafting beautiful stuff with our own hands and the help from useful tools is a wonderful process.
Don't miss any featured product by categories.

Years of experience brought about by our skilled craftsmen could ensure that every piece
produced is a work of art. Our focus is always the best quality possible.
We make commitments that the quality of our products will and always will be
We accept returns for freshly purchased products within 7 days from the payment.
Upon request, items bought as gifts from our store can receive free wrapping service.
Once receiving your order, we will turn your products around in 3- 5 business days.
